domain_terms.Enterprise Architecture: Holistic view of organizational strategy, business processes, information systems, and technology infrastructure
domain_terms.Business Capability: What the business does or can do, independent of how it's done
domain_terms.Target State: Desired future architecture aligned with business strategy
domain_terms.Architecture Roadmap: Planned sequence of transitions from current to target state
domain_terms.Architecture Governance: Practice of monitoring and directing architecture activities

framework_description: business capabilities, target state architecture, roadmap alignment, and governance
